article: Most American families like to have a holiday in summer. Summer is a good season  _  holidays. It is very  _  during the months of July and August. Children do not go to school during these  _  months. Some  _  like to stay at home during the holiday. They work in the garden,  visit  friends,  _  books, or watch TV. Many families  _  their lunch to a park or somewhere far from the city. They like to eat where there are many trees or there is a nice lake.  _  they live near the sea, they often go to the beach. They can fish, swim or enjoy the sun there. America is a large country. Many families travel by  car  or by train to see interesting places. They also travel by plane to a foreign country. Many big cities have many famous buildings, theatres, shops and  other  places for travellers .
